tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dna_sequences (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  dna_sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE evolution_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    comparison_species_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species_dna_sequences(species_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (comparison_species_id) REFERENCES species_dna_sequences(species_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Species ( species_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_name STRING, species_description STRING );
CREATE TABLE DNA_Sequence ( sequence_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sequence_data STRING, species_id INT REFERENCES Species(species_id) );
CREATE TABLE Evolution_Study ( study_id INT PRIMARY KEY, study_name STRING, species_id INT REFERENCES Species(species_id), sequence_id INT REFERENCES DNA_Sequence(sequence_id) );
CREATE TABLE Species (species_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, species_name STRING, common_name STRING, scientific_name STRING);
CREATE TABLE DNA_Sequence (sequence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, species_id UUID, sequence_data STRING, FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id));

CREATE TABLE Evolutionary_Tree (tree_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, species_id UUID, ancestor_species_id UUID, ancestor_distance FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id), FOREIGN KEY (ancestor_species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id));

CREATE TABLE Mutation (mutation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, sequence_id UUID, mutation_position INT, nucleotide_before CHAR, nucleotide_after CHAR, FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id) REFERENCES DNA_Sequence(sequence_id));

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResult (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_id INT NOT NULL,
  sequence_id INT NOT NULL,
  similarity_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES EvolutionAnalysis(analysis_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id) REFERENCES DNASequence(sequence_id)
);
